vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κῆτος, εος, τό,
any sea-monster or huge fish, δελφῖνάς τε κύνας τε καὶ εἴ ποθι μεῖζον ἑλῃσι κῆτος [Refs 8th c.BC+]; of seals, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; of the monster to which Andromeda was exposed, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of the tunny, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 in Natural History, of the spouting cetacea, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II name of a constellation, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
huge fish
a large fish, sea monster, whale, Mt. 12:40*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: gran criatura marítima, pez grande, monstruo marino
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: một con quái vật biển; cá voi; cá khổng lồ
